item.description:
Let's enjoy the beautiful summer night by starting with some live music and drinks at MFA, followed by a very fun french comedy (with English subtitle) "Day at the Museum":

A Day at the Museum (Musée haut musée bas) by Jean-Michel Ribes (2008, 97 min.). In Ribes's free-form film--based on his successful play about an art museum literally falling apart--a curator is terrorized by plants, a minister gets lost in a sex exhibition, tourists gallop from one room to the next, and a stowaway hides in the ancient art section. In this fantastic museum, a microcosm of the larger world takes form, creating a soaring, almost burlesque comedy.


The movie starts at 8pm
http://www.mfa.org/ca...

There's music starting 5:30pm (need to pay museum admission fee if you are not member)
http://www.mfa.org/ca...

I will be there by 7 to enjoy the music and drinks.

If you only want to show up for the movie, be at the theater entrance between 7:40-7:50.

I will email those who RSVP-ed how to find me.
item.how_to_find_us: I will email you how to find me
item.name: French Movie and Live Music at MFA
